## Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Details:

* **Tender Reference:** WS4510085841-Doc4527834967
* **Contract Title:** Fence Repair and Replacement Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category:** [Compute-Related Category]: Construction and Professional Services (Skilled Labour)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Lee, Victoria (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20111201?extsite=MjAxMTEyMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Description:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested contractors to submit their bids for the Fence Repair and Replacement Standing Offer. This Standing Offer is for a period of 2 years and 3 one-year option periods.

### Scope of Work:

The selected contractor will provide labour, materials, transportation, tools, equipment, administration, and supervision necessary for the installation, construction, and servicing of various types of fencing, including electronic gates, at the following locations:

* CFB Winnipeg (Manitoba)
* St. Charles Range, Saskatchewan Ave, Winnipeg, MB
* Headingley TX site, Headingley, MB

Services will be provided on an "as requested basis." The total anticipated duration of the Standing Offer is 5 years.

### Tender Evaluation:

One (1) firm will be issued the Standing Offer Agreement. The contract will be awarded based on variations or combinations of evaluation methods.

### Important Dates:

* **Publication Date:** June 24, 2024
* **Closing Date:** July 25, 2024 at 14:00 HRS (Mountain Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date:** July 02, 2024

Please note that the closing time has been amended to July 25, 2024 at 14:00 HRS (Mountain Daylight Time). All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. An additional requirement for supporting documentation must be submitted by July 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM (Mountain Daylight Time).

Please refer to the attached notice URL for more information. [[Insert URL]]
